title: Development of carboxymethyl cellulose–chitosan based antibacterial films incorporating a Persicaria minor Huds. essential oil nanoemulsion
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,400-414
DOI: 10.1039/D3FB00183K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yu-Hsuan How, Emily Min-Yan Lim, Ianne Kong, Phei-Er Kee, Liew-Phing Pui
As plastic waste has continued to increase over the years, there is an appeal for environmental-friendly packaging containing bioactive components such as essential oil for food packaging.
